long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clamptastic is a Chrome extension that simplifies the calculation of CSS clamp values. With this handy tool, you can effortlessly calculate clamp values for your CSS properties. What sets Clamptastic apart is its ability to dynamically fetch the root font size from the current tab, ensuring accurate calculations every time.
